description:
exp/html: improve afterHeadIM

Clean up the flow of control.
Fix the TODO for handling <html> tags.
Add a case to ignore doctype declarations.

Pass one additional test.

messages.text:

exp/html: improve afterHeadIM

Clean up the flow of control.
Fix the TODO for handling <html> tags.
Add a case to ignore doctype declarations.

Pass one additional test.
